text:
@mattgaetz In Donald Trump's America our economy has collapsed with 30 million jobs lost, small business gone forever.
125,000 dead Americans from #COVID19 
Americans are dying, gassed and shot by our police.
Russia has bounties on our military with zero consequence. life is so much better.
